content:
As an AI language model, I can only provide general advice and cannot provide personalized recommendations. That being said, which strategy would be the most effective for a small business that wants to scale quickly and efficiently depends on various factors such as the size of the business, the market, and the product or service being offered. 

Based on general trends and data, investing in technology and outsourcing may be the most effective strategies for a small business that wants to scale quickly and efficiently. Investing in technology can help automate and optimize operations, improving efficiency and reducing costs. Outsourcing non-critical tasks to third-party vendors can reduce overhead costs and free up resources that can be focused on growth.

However, it is important for small businesses to evaluate their individual needs and unique circumstances when deciding on a scaling strategy. Working with a professional business consultant or advisor can help evaluate your options and create a tailored plan for your business.
